Alex Jordan, born in 1984, is a former rugby league player turned sports commentator, known for his insightful analysis and vibrant on-air personality. During his playing days, Alex had a notable career and once faced off against Rueben Porter in a thrilling match that fans still talk about. Transitioning into sports commentary after hanging up his boots, he brings his love and deep understanding of the game into his broadcasts, earning the respect of both peers and audiences alike. He has a penchant for storytelling, often sharing anecdotes from his playing years and encounters with sports legends.
